text: ( Photo : Youtube ) When audiences see the choreographed routines in The Greatest Showman, it ’ ll look effortless. But as Zendaya said on The Tonight Show Monday, actually making the movie was anything but. Zendaya plays acrobat Anne Wheeler in the movie, co - starring Rebecca Ferguson, Hugh Jackman and Michelle Williams. Zac Efron plays Anne ’ s love interest, stage actor Phillip Carlyle.
